Member Function Documentation

void CMuleThread::Stop (  )  [inline]

Stops the thread.

For detached threads, this function is equivalent to Delete, but is also useable for joinable threads, where Delete should not be used, due to crashes experienced in that case. In the case of joinable threads, Wait is called rather than Delete.

See also:
wxThread::Delete

References m_stop.
